data.eml:eml: New species and records of the Pericoma trifasciata group from Croatia (Diptera: Psychodidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Kvifte, Gunnar Mikalsen, Ivković, Marija (2018): New species and records of the Pericoma trifasciata group from Croatia (Diptera: Psychodidae). Zootaxa 4486 (1): 76-82, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4486.1.5
